description: Frederick Keys is now hiring Account Manager - Sponsorship Sales in Frederick, MD 21703. View job listing details and apply now. ACCOUNT MANAGER Sponsorship Sales The Frederick Keys are members of the Major League Baseball Draft League Frederick is a market of 250000 people that sits about 45 miles from both Baltimore and Washington DC We are seeking a dedicated professional to partner with our team moving towards the 2023 baseball season RESPONSIBILITIES Prospect and sell all baseball club inventory including but not limited to signage promotions print firework sponsorships ticket plans group tickets and hospitality Focus on relationship building and servicing clients after the sale Fulfillexecute sponsorship and groupticket accounts Responsible for the retention and renewal of sponsorship and ticket clients Other duties as assigned by the General Manager and Director of Customer Services EXPERIENCE REQUIRED Degree from 4-year program Minimum of 1-2 years sports experience Minimum of 1-2 years sales experience Individual must be energetic enthusiastic and dedicated Individual must be able to handle multiple projects meet deadlines and achieve objectives QUALIFICATIONS Prior experience in advertisinghospitality sales experience is preferred Candidates applying for this position should be aggressive in seeking new business and be comfortable with cold calling Ability to work event nights weekends and holidays as required Superior problem-solver with ability to work independently Effective organizational and follow-up skills Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Must be a team player and be willing to help out in all areas of the business START DATE TBD SALARY AND COMPENSATION Base salary is commensurate with experience Additional compensation is earned through a bonus plan Healthdentalvision plan and 401k
